lenders.name: Paddy
lenders.occupational_info: Volunteer, charitable

lenders.name: melany
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.  It's a good cause. It's very important for me and everybody should do it.  It's so simple, and it can help someone have a better life.  Thanks to Kiva, great initiative!

lenders.name: Tsering
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in India and i know how hard to get loan and start a new company or small shop.

lenders.name: Cheryl & Andrew
lenders.loan_because: We are both entrepeneurs and recognize what an opportunity Kiva & our loans will provide to a lot of hard working people that don't have the same advantages that we have.

lenders.name: Jose Maria
lenders.loan_because:
It became clear to me that I can make a huge impact on someone else's life by loaning a small amount of money. I also like the principle of Kiva and the fact that it promotes entrepreneurship, education, self-discipline and creativity. 
Two people I've never met, one in Kenya and one in Peru, will have the chance to improve their lives in a very practical way by I decision I made, one that also helped better my own life.
My favorite Kiva fact:  a repayment rate of 99.77% and we are talking very underprivileged applicants in what we like to call "third world countries". Amazing, uh?
lenders.occupational_info: I direct operas and theater plays

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I like to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children in multiple subjects between the ages of 12 and 18.

lenders.name: Filipe
lenders.whereabouts: Vila Nova de Gaia Douro Litoral
lenders.loan_because: I belive that we can make history by ending poverty. This is a good way!

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because:
This loan is to honor my daughters.  Merry Christmas!!!

I know what its like to need  help sometimes.  If I can help just a little for someone else to have a better life, no matter who they are or where they live, WHY NOT?

lenders.name: Joao
lenders.loan_because: With a small amount of money I can make a difference

lenders.name: Kelly and Joann
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we are blessed to be successful women entrepreneurs who want to help other women less fortunate than ourselves succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: We are residential interiors designers. Our job is to make homes beautiful, warm and happy - no matter what kind of home they are.

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: I hope my time here in this life will have a positive impact on others, most especially those less fortunate - I care deeply about Africa.
lenders.occupational_info: I collect financial data.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to help someone in need. I'm not able to do as much as I would like, but this allows me to at least do something. I have children and have been single and struggling at times. This makes me want to help other women with children.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at the computer most of the day and attend to my home & family the rest of the day.

lenders.name: doug siddall
lenders.loan_because: it seems like a worthwhile business and feel that they will make a go of it.

lenders.name: Darren
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to help some people who don´t have so much possibilities like we in Germany!!
lenders.occupational_info: At the moment i study tourism in Germany. After the study i want to work for development projects to help people.

lenders.name: Kelli
lenders.loan_because: ""I am only one, but still I am one. I cannot do everything, but still can do something; and because I cannot do everything I will not refuse to do the somthing that I can do." ~Helen Keller"
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently going to school in MN...I am a Women Studies major and a human relations minor.  I love it!!

lenders.name: Rose
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to be able to make a difference for someone...
lenders.occupational_info: I used to be in High Tech...

lenders.name: April
lenders.loan_because: I want to do anything I can to help others who aren't able to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in college working towards a degree in labor and employment relations.

lenders.name: Lorina & Rick
lenders.loan_because: We want the women (and men) in the world to be empowered and have chances which they deserve in life. There is nothing in life gained by selfishness and therefore we want to be able to help in a small way to improve the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: Rick is an automotive technician. He has been doing this for over 20 years. Lorina is in IT and works for a wonderful company. Their 4 children keep them very occupied.

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to have my own company that helps me support my family. This wouldn't have been possible without the assistance and encouragement I've received from others over the years. I'd like to help other people achieve the same self-reliance and ability to care for their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I strategically help companies develop their brand, designing logos, identities, user experiences, packaging, signage, advertising, websites, etc.

lenders.name: Mimi
lenders.loan_because: I believe that this is one of the best gifts you can give yourself and someone else.  We are obligated as fellow humans to help one another in any way we can regardless of where we were born on the globe.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I am thankful!

lenders.name: the silk purse event center inc.
Mary Therese
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Elke B
lenders.loan_because: what goes around comes around..We are all capable of helping others and being kind to people around us

lenders.name: Aida
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderfull thing to make other people's dream  become true
lenders.occupational_info: I restaur works of art in paper (books, drawings, water colour paintings, etc)

lenders.name: DGA Barrios
lenders.loan_because: We also believe that we are all responsible for each other and the idea of supporting others on their way to self sustainability

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: This opportunity was given to me as a gift.  It is a gift that warms the heart and keeps on giving.  I plan to "pay it forward" by giving Kiva gift certificates for Christmas.  To me, that is the true Spirit of  Christmas...helping others that are less fortunate.

lenders.name: Johan
lenders.loan_because: it's a good way to help poor people to improve their standard of living.
lenders.occupational_info: I love touristic kayaking (flat water only). Have a look at my website and see how beautiful my country looks from the water.

lenders.name: shari
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someones life
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people to ride motocycles and write mortgages for people who need a break to acheive the american dream of ownign their own home

lenders.name: Wallace
lenders.loan_because: I like to see progress and development. I am also a strong supporter of microlending.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at Dartmouth College in Hanover, New Hampshire.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: A little help from me may be a lot of help to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: Writer, editor and web designer for a business trade publication.

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because: I know how difficult it can be to get a small business off the ground, and am delighted to be able to help entrepreneurs around the world to achieve their goals and dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I design software systems that solve complex business problems

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.occupation: social worker and mental health counselor
lenders.loan_because: I can't imagine knowing that lending like this was possible and not doing it.
lenders.occupational_info: I meet with children who are having trouble - they can't do the things they're supposed to do, or they're always sad or always angry, or they don't know how to be friends with other children, or many other kinds of trouble - and I try to understand with them what is wrong at the root.  And then, once we understand the problems better, I do what I can to help, and I teach the children to do what they can to help themselves.  Sometimes I talk with their teachers or their families or anyone else who is important in their lives, so that we can all work together to make things better.

lenders.name: Renee
lenders.loan_because: My family and I feels it is a great learning experience for me
lenders.occupational_info: I have just graduated from High School and look forward to my future.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: A group of us had dinner with Kiva co-founder Matt Flannery at Monmouth College one evening and his passion for Kiva's mission is catching!   Kiva is a wonderful opportunity to help others around the world fulfill their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: CEO of a manufacturing company

lenders.name: Naoya
lenders.loan_because: friends help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: working for a Japanese trading firm.

lenders.name: Ginga
lenders.loan_because: world has to be changed and at last, money is only money.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: Lending to women is a way to empower them. This is very important to me. Helping others become self sufficient is  a way to celebrate my good fortune and move our world away from poverty.

lenders.name: Karl and Chellie
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us that we could be a blessing.

lenders.name: Abraham
lenders.loan_because: I can!  Everyone who can should, it makes things so much easier and helps people across the world become able to do the same for others.

lenders.name: Bryce
lenders.loan_because: we care.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: It is only by helping that the world can become a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I study human behavior in the workplace

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.occupational_info: I coax computers into working as intended

lenders.name: Miranda
lenders.loan_because: I believe Americans are sometimes too spoiled to want to help out other people, even if it is only $25.
lenders.occupational_info: I forecast the weather in the US military.

lenders.name: Barb B & Terry C
lenders.loan_because: We care

lenders.name: Marion
lenders.loan_because: I feel fortunate to have what I have and would like to help others prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: I design the graphical look of web pages and then program the code needed to display the page on the Internet.

lenders.name: Michael & Ronda
lenders.loan_because: We are the hands and feet of Jesus Christ on this earth. We give out of the abundance He has given our family.

lenders.name: Claudette
lenders.loan_because: To help make the world a better place, and to help others do the same.

lenders.name: Boots
lenders.loan_because: we are all connected and need to care for each other
lenders.occupational_info: i want to spread as much joy as i can through western medicine, spiritual healing, love and laughter

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people around the world that can't help themselves.

lenders.name: Paul & Phyllis
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Paul DRAKE
lenders.loan_because: this is such a worthy cause

lenders.name: Cassie
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have the resources to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell scientific instruments and equipment to medical research and academic/education laboratories for clinical, molecular and microbiological experiments.

lenders.name: alexandra
lenders.loan_because: I lend because i feel fortunate with what I have in my life and want to give other people a chance to make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a psychology student at a university and hope to work with underprivileged children.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I live a life of countless blessings and look for ways to pass those on. Kiva makes the world a smaller place in a very good way, giving us all an opportunity to give and receive.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find homes and realize their dreams. And I make a lot of new friends along the way.

lenders.name: Tony and Juanita
lenders.loan_because: we want to help those who have the desire to help themselves.

lenders.name: Gabrielle
lenders.loan_because: I want my kids to know that you can make a difference in the world by contributing what you can, when you can with an open heart and an open mind.
lenders.occupational_info: Being the mother of four children is my dream job - it's exhausting and enormously satisfying.

lenders.name: José Pedro Vasconcelos
lenders.loan_because:
" Só os peixes mortos nadam a favor da corrente"
P. Manh

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I am a business owner and want to support people to support themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I train people to become trainers; and train associates in become better employees.  As well, I am a volunteer advocate and career counsellor for international people moving to Canada.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I believe one can make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I help people plan for retirement

lenders.name: Kelli
lenders.loan_because: I want to join the fight to help stop poverty around the world.  I see this as the best way to do it.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I am currently deployed to Iraq.  I am a Medic, and I work in the Emergency Room at a Hospital.  I help take care of sick and injured soldiers, local nationals, and civilians.

lenders.name: Ernie
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance allows people around the world to build a business that could sustain them for years to come.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a teacher in a very small, democratic school which honors and nurtures children's natural curiosity and development.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: The best thing to do with money is to spread it around to make more.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband is a veterinarian who sees pets in their homes. I talk to the owners and arrange visit times. Also I am responsible for accounts and some record keeping. My children are grown but I keep in touch with them and sometimes watch my grandchildren.

lenders.name: Janis
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in this world and I think that we can all grow, learn and achieve anything when we give!
lenders.occupational_info: I am the mother of 3 incredible children and I stay home and take care of them.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy being connected to people all over the world, and I understand from my time in Peace Corps Bolivia that sometimes it only takes something small to really help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I do home visits with low income spanish-speaking families and help them learn about health, parenting, self-esteem, and other resources available to them in the community.

lenders.name: Darlene R.
lenders.loan_because: I've been fortunate to receive many blessings in my life, and I want to share them with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a wonderful group of people in a successful company that constructs office buildings in Arizona, in the Southwest United States.

lenders.name: Jacki
lenders.loan_because: My parents were small business owners, and now I am too. They taught me that it's important to share your success with others. My dad has everything in the world, so I thought a gift certificate to Kiva would make a meaningful Christmas present.
lenders.occupational_info: I write advertisements to help companies sell their products. I also have a small greeting card company

lenders.name: Mary Grace
lenders.loan_because: I want to help individuals reach their goals
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired -- but we spend  a lot of time on our boat visiting the islands and places of the great Northwest.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: Jesus loves all of us.

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because: I'm impressed, amazed, and inspired by the entrepreneurs I read about on Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach middle school students- ages 12-15.  It is the best job for me.  I smile and enjoy going to work everyday.

lenders.name: Thackers and spouses
lenders.loan_because: This is a Christmas gift in the name of my family and spouses.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a mobile phone software company.

lenders.name: Chad
lenders.loan_because: The Golden Rule.  I would hope that someone would do the same for me if I needed help.

lenders.name: The Scott Family
lenders.loan_because: The concept of  'eternal' micro loans is amazing and we couldn't wait to be a part of it.

lenders.name: Laiko
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurism helps communuities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help businesses prosper.

lenders.name: Suzee
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell things

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's important to help people improve their future and that of their children.

lenders.name: Dani
lenders.loan_because: capitalism rules!

lenders.name: Marni
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life and wish to share with people who are trying to carve out a better future for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm trying to shine a little light into the darker corners of the world by what I do, say and write.

lenders.name: Perk & Jody
lenders.loan_because: Through hard work and just plain luck being born in a land of plenty we are fortunate and want to advance the opportunity to others.
lenders.occupational_info: Perk- I have been a tennis professional for 30 years and Jody manages healthcare services.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: It's the least I can do!

lenders.name: J&B family
lenders.loan_because: We hope that by making small micro loans we can help empower people and change lives.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a family of two students, a photographer, and a director of a non-profit community land trust.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.occupational_info: I teach technology related courses to people from around the world and they inspire me to give.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be in a position to assist people that need it.
lenders.occupational_info: Help people buy and sell homes.

lenders.name: Margie, Lorrie, Shirley
lenders.loan_because: In memory of our mother who was a single, independent woman of wisdom, laughter, and beauty.
lenders.occupational_info:
Margie teaches African drumming,
Lorrie works on government contracts and Shirley is a mortgage lender

lenders.name: donna
lenders.occupational_info: I provide elderly people with care that they can not give themselves.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: The need is there and so we help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired after working 30 years as a Librarian. I love seeing how books make the world come alive for people. Books are our connection to each other.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate than myself whereby they  change their lives for the better.

lenders.name: Rene
lenders.loan_because: I'm changing lives.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Its good!

lenders.name: Asma
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Hire people for various jobs.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because:
"Whatever affects one directly, affects all indirectly. I can never be what I ought to be until you are what you ought to be. This is the interrelated structure of reality."

Martin Luther King, Jr.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on reference books in the social and health sciences.

lenders.name: Ron & June
lenders.loan_because: We lend to share with others and to build a bond between hard-working people all over the world.

lenders.name: sujan
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the poor are equally able to employ fiscal responsibility and financial profitability through access to financial services, generally unavailable to the poor. Through microfinance, some may be able to improve the quality of their lives (and of their families)... in hopes to one day pull themselves out of poverty.

lenders.name: Ryan McRae
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people. We have a responsibility to assist those in need.
lenders.occupational_info:
I recently graduated from Brandeis University in Massachusetts, with a BA in Politics and Philosophy. I am now a 1L at Suffolk University Law School. I am interested in human rights, civil rights, children's rights, international law, international trade, constitutional law, jurisprudence, and the like. 

I am absolutely obsessed with artisanal and craft beer; I run the beer department at one of the highest-ranked beer stores in Massachusetts. I was also recently laid off from my longtime supermarket job, where I was an evening manager and supervisor. I try to loan mostly to individuals in retail, as I know how hard the job can be in comfortable suburban America; I can't imagine how difficult owning and operating a small retail outfit can be in less fortunate parts of this world. I hope I have made a difference.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to share my undeserved privilege with those who are working to lift themselves out of poverty.

lenders.name: susan
lenders.loan_because: we have so much in this country and I want to do my part to help those who aren't as advantaged.

lenders.name: R, G & I
lenders.loan_because: living in the Southwestern US, we see a great need to help build strong economies in our neighboring countries so that people can earn a liveable wage without having to leave their home and without having to risk their lives.

lenders.name: Schwartz Family
lenders.loan_because: Great friends gave us this great gift to help us teach our children about giving to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with computers and my spouse helps people with mental illness function in society.

lenders.name: Cara
lenders.loan_because: Why not?

lenders.name: Dale & Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: Help is something we all need from time to time in our life. If you can help then give, if you need help then seek.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: As the purse is emptied, the heart is filled. (V. Hugo)

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: Giving some one a hand to help them pull themselves up, helps a whole community.
lenders.occupational_info: I make graphic marks that represent people and companies. I also make web sites.

lenders.name: Kasey
lenders.loan_because: I've had the opportunity to travel to many places in the world. With this opportunity comes the knowledge of economic inequalities among the world's people. Once you possess the knowledge that there is something within your power that you can do to help someone in need, you ultimately have the power to make one person's dream a reality. I find that to be amazingly beautiful.
lenders.occupational_info: I want to see the places I've only heard about.

lenders.name: Scott & Lucy
lenders.loan_because: My aunt gave me money for Christmas with a challenge to make a difference in someone else's life.  I have made 11 loans with KIVA so far.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in 4th grade and I study hard to get straight  A's.  I love baseball and play first base and pitch.

lenders.name: bruce
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to give back and to teach people how to make it on their own terms
lenders.occupational_info: a smile giver

lenders.name: Mayette
lenders.loan_because: I feel very fortunate that I live in a part of the world where life is relatively easy.  I have a good life, a good family and a good job.  If my small contribution can help better another person's life in another part of the world, then I am happy to do it.

lenders.name: Zeke
lenders.occupational_info: I am a high school student. I don't make too much money. A lot of the money I make I give away, because I know there are a lot of people much worse off than me. The idea of micro loans sounds great.  Check out Future Builders (www.future-builders.org), it is an organization I started.

lenders.name: ann
lenders.loan_because: because I want to help people get out of poverty and help them produce their own food.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 3 to 7 year old children and I have a few animals of my own and a big garden.

lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.loan_because: Helping someone help themselves is the key to changing our world for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to have a high paying job that I hated, so I quit it and went back to school to learn how to start my own business. I am a bartender when I am not at school at the best restaurant in the area.

lenders.name: Janine
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an English teacher from Oregon.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that sells skin care goods.

lenders.name: Tobi
lenders.loan_because: I want to help spread wealth.

lenders.name: shannon
lenders.loan_because: I respect entrepreneurs, who try to go out and make something out of nothing--it's inspirational to all, and if I can help them to succeed in their dream, I want to!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an American who has been living in Korea for the past 7 years teaching English.  I've taught in various countries and love the diversity the world offers!

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is to need a break
lenders.occupational_info: My research looks at the bad things that happen to the brain if you drink when you are pregnant.

lenders.name: Maissa
lenders.loan_because: Those who are able must help ones in need.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people with dreams and aspirations.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: I like to see people support themselves through hard work.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with teen-aged parents. I help them find resources so that they can be great parents AND finish their education.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: I was inspired through my Economics class. I figured, why not? Besides, one can always use some good karma :)
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student... fairly self explanatory, I would imagine.

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because:
When many people who can each do a little come together, great things happen : )

I loan because I am blessed and want to bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wife, mother and grandmother. I care for others because God first cared for me.

lenders.name: Russell
lenders.loan_because: acting humanly.........

lenders.name: Randell
lenders.loan_because:
Giving is Awesome!

You are welcome!
lenders.occupational_info:
Design Computer Networks
Invest in Real Estate
Love to Surf

lenders.name: Dalien
lenders.loan_because:
Changing the world - bit by bit. 
Then, byte by byte.
lenders.occupational_info: Made just about one useful thing in secondlife, the rest of the time trying to make noise for good causes :-)

lenders.name: Stuart
lenders.loan_because: You can loan the same money again and again. So you help a lot of people with the same dollar.
lenders.occupational_info: I work keeping computers safe. I like to bike, program, and eat food with my friends.

lenders.name: rita
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Stuart
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Lillian
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back
lenders.occupational_info: International Consulting

lenders.name: X111
lenders.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is sustainable. It  helps build confidence and retain self respect and dignity.

lenders.name: jasmine
lenders.loan_because: i want my kids to learn to give
lenders.occupational_info: challenging/rewarding

lenders.name: Kevin and Urmi
lenders.loan_because: I feel everyone deserves a chance at a better life and it's a small gesture to help those that are less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and implement information technology solutions

lenders.name: Terence
lenders.loan_because:
Just about US$1 a year you can help someone across the world!!

I loan because I believe that everyone in the world can spend a little effort to help those needed.
From accounting point of view, the loan will have a positive spiral effect to the whole community.  
On the other hand, to me, the loan is recyclable (I can lend to someone later).  The opportunity cost is just around a dollar per year for every US25 you lend.

If someone in Hong Kong can make the loan, so are you all over the world!!

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: it feels good!
lenders.occupational_info: Retail Sales, Children's Clothing and Accessories

lenders.name: MARA
lenders.loan_because: It's a pleasure to know that giving so little can help so many realize their dreams.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: Providing easy access to capital is a great way to help those in need in developing countries without having them resort to charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software

lenders.name: Lozza
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people!

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: Creating and giving opportunities is the best form of charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses and people sell things

lenders.name: Vishal
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to give to struggling individuals in a developing country. Since loans are repaid, the same money can be transferred from one loan recipient to another and another and yet another. It's the gift that keeps on giving! Forever!
lenders.occupational_info: I make games.

lenders.name: luis
lenders.loan_because: I beleave if we can help people to achieve their aims, world will be a better place.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Sneaky

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: I am interested in helping people in other countries help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a college professor teaching Biology until I retired.

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: I am part of a not for profit group who give talks on living sustainable, fulfilling, socially just lives, so donating in this way is walking the walk as well as talking the talk!
lenders.occupational_info: To understand my voluntary work go to www.changingthedream.org.au

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Alexandra Camacho
lenders.loan_because: I believe some small changes really change the world for better!!
lenders.occupational_info: Connecting people.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Self sufficient people are the most apt to stay free.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired, formerly self-employed... more or less.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I can  So easy to make my lunch instead of buying out    allows me the opportunity to help

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great way to support entrepeneurs!

lenders.name: Tami
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the best life possible

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: giving is an important values model which inspires others to give.  The multiplier effect from giving (and the role model of giving) is immeasurable.  Also, I feel a sense of responsibility to help others who are in need and working their way through it.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep children safe so that their role models may have the greatest positive impact and influence on shaping character.

lenders.name: Rhonda
lenders.loan_because: It feels great to help others achieve their maximum potential & success. Through Kiva, I can reach people who would have never received assistance. I am so proud of all the entrepreneurs who are claiming success! Thanks Kiva & all the lenders around the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I support women and girls on 6 continents in raising their self-worth and building unshakable confidence so they can do, be and have anything their heart desires -- personally and professionally.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people solve their computer problems.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I love the fact that the western world can get money straight to those who really need it
lenders.occupational_info: I run an estate agency in France with my business partner Kate (also a Kiva lender - she got me started!). We have had to battle the system a bit here to set up our business and we have now opened our second office, so we like the fact that we can give to other small businesses

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: It's the very least I can do for those who are determined to overcome their current situation.

lenders.name: Hamilton
lenders.loan_because: I believe in teaching a person to fish rather than giving the person a fish. I also admire these people who have taken the initiative to improve their lot in life instead of waiting for hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: As a professional I manage a lot of people from all walks of life. I take pride in "leading" as opposed to pushing those whom I manage.

lenders.name: Niklas
lenders.loan_because: To sit down and wish for things to happen is not an option anymore.
lenders.occupational_info: I am sterilizing medical supplies by the use of electron beams.

lenders.name: Gabriella
lenders.loan_because: the feeling of being able to give to someone, and help someone trying to do something meaningfull is undescribable. Even with such small amounts as $25!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 3rd grade techer. I think teaching is the internationally most wellknown and familiar occupation. We're everywhere! Besides teaching children to read and write I try to prepare them for the community they're going to live and hopefully prosper in.

lenders.name: tanisha
lenders.loan_because: i wanna give and get that satisfaction i get in me when i can help in return

lenders.name: Ylva
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a perfect way to help others!

lenders.name: Jennie
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Yvonne & Stephan
lenders.loan_because: This is one of the best ideas ever!

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is hot!

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I can share with others who are willing to work hard to improve their lives and the lives of people in their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a Science Teacher who worked in a rural high school in Canada. Now, I help run a library of science teaching ideas (www.stao.org) to help others teach science to young people around the world.

lenders.name: Cori
lenders.loan_because: It's a nice feeling to be able to provide assistance to an individual as opposed to an organization at large, and to know specifically how your assistance will help them. It feels less anonymous than other kinds of aid.
lenders.occupational_info: I turned my passion into a business. I love horses, and my own experiences trying to find saddles that fit me and my horses well led to the creation of my own business selling saddles. I help people in find saddles that fit horse and rider well. My website focuses on saddles for hunter/jumper riders.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.occupational_info: I work project managing the building of schools across the city of Birmingham.

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: It´s a great opportunity to be able to help someone in need, across the globe,  to a better life.

lenders.name: Matsonian
lenders.loan_because: I am devoted to helping others to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I think of ideas and work hard and long at turning them into successful businesses.

lenders.name: TRACEY
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel connected to the planet. Also, it is amazing when someone beleives in you, empowering. It makes me feel great knowing I can help someone to feel that way - better themselves and most of the time, their community.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed and I want to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a network administrator for a community bank in northern Michigan.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money for a major University.

lenders.name: Troy
lenders.loan_because:
It seems like an effective way to make a difference in the world.

Since joining, the original $25 I contributed has been loaned and re-loaned 8 times and still going.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: ...it helps alleviate my "First World" guilt. I travel a lot, often to countries serviced by Kiva, and want to help in a more enduring way than by buying tourist trinkets I don't really want.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to improve their lives.

lenders.name: RAY
lenders.loan_because:
I HAVE BEEN READING A BOOK CALLED "BITTER CHOCOLATE" BY CAROL OFF, WHICH RECORDS THE PLIGHT OF ADULTS AND CHILDREN WHO ARE FORCED INTO SLAVERY OR INDENTURED LABOUR IN AFRICA, TO GROW AND HARVEST COCOA BEANS. 
MANY OF THEM LEAVE BECAUSE THEY THINK THAT THEY WILL MAKE ENOUGH MONEY TO LOOK AFTER THEIR FAMILIES, BUT THIS IS RARELY , IF EVER , THE CASE.
IT MADE ME REALISE HOW EVEN A SMAAL MONETARY CONTRIBUTION CAN MAKE A HUGE DIFFERENCE IN THE LIVES OF OTHERS. 
I WOULD LIKE TO PREVENT JUST ONE PERSON OR FAMILY FROM HAVING TO LIVE THIS WAY.

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help small businesses in other countries expand and be able to support their families and send their children to school.  I like to feel that I'm supporting a means to end poverty by providing an avenue for people to boost their business and help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell supplemental insurance that pays money to families when they go through things like cancer and accidents.

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back and help others who were not born as fortunate as I was.
lenders.occupational_info: I manager a group that fixes computers.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: I love missions! I give this as a gift to my co-workers for Christmas in their honor.
lenders.occupational_info: Always giving and loving every minute of it. I work with at risk children as well as teenagers.

lenders.name: Axel Manø
lenders.loan_because: I believe that what I do makes a difference, and since I have the possibilty to make the world a better place for someone - it's a duty for me.
lenders.occupational_info: Im a student of international business

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.occupational_info: I basically help to keep track of money that comes in and money that goes out of the company I work for.

lenders.name: Myrna
lenders.loan_because: I have always believed in the principal of 'helping people to help themselves'.  Kiva is a great way to do this.  I love when I have repaid money and get to pick a new person to help out!

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to help others and to share my blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: I create websites.

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves the opportunity to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I study community planning at the University of Maryland.  I dream of improving the lives of many people through planning for the future of the places where they live, work, and play.

lenders.name: dvinedesigns.etsy.com
lenders.loan_because: I can! I love the concept and love what it does to the people and their families!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for AT&T during the day as a graphic designer. At night and on the weekends I'm making Jewelry and selling at craft fairs, dvinedesigns.etsy.com and on Ebay. Making Miracles every day!!

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: helping individuals succeed, helps the world
lenders.occupational_info: I help teach people who live in cities about nature.

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: I have the ability to help and the motivation to do so. I know that the world can only really change one person at a time and I am committed to doing my part.
lenders.occupational_info: The legal situation in any given case I deal with only offers a container for the real work that I do: to help clients realize how their choices effect their experiences and how making better choices in alignment with integrity can and does bring real and lasting success. Since Kiva is founded on the same principles of working in integrity, I am overjoyed to be a part of it and to have been able to offer gift certificates to my clients and colleagues as Christmas presents so that they can also experience the real joy of sharing.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I like to feel that my money is helping people at the grass roots make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I tutor college students, am semi-retired from college teaching, write a lot of poetry and various articles.

lenders.name: Kathi and Rick
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help others.  We are so fortunate in the US.  We need to support hard working people in other countries.
lenders.occupational_info: Wholesale business

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: a  little encouragement can go a long way!
lenders.occupational_info: I spin, knit, weave and sew all I can

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I love seeing that people can take action to improve their lives and have the opportunity to grow.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people align their natural passion with their career.

lenders.name: Aliyah
lenders.loan_because: to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: i have just started my path to organic sustainable farming. i believe that the food we eat is essential to our health both physically, mentally, and spiritually. using methods of agriculture that work with nature, will best help heal mother earth and heal the human spirit.

lenders.name: SSLA - BIG
lenders.loan_because: Nothing is impossible

lenders.name: anna
lenders.loan_because: It's a sustainable form of accompaniment.

lenders.name: GEORGE
lenders.loan_because: Micro lending not only helps the borrower but also those around them.   Kiva is doing a wonderful service with this web site.
lenders.occupational_info: I invest in small office buildings and shopping centers.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I believe every person should have an equal opportunity to improve their lifestyle through their own initiative.
lenders.occupational_info: I successfully built a multi-million dollar business which my son now operates. I manage a group of fishing and hunting lodges in Saskatchewan, Canada, as my retirement activity.

lenders.name: Harvey
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I ride around coming up with idea's that I'm gonna do someday.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I can't afford grand gestures so this allows me to help people without the opportunities that I have, in small ways.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an advertising display company, doing administrative work and scheduling for our production area.

lenders.name: Deb & Urban
lenders.loan_because: We want to share some of our good fortune...

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I love people and feel it's important to help those who are willing to work to create the life they desire but may need a little help from their friends!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people discover what is programed in their subconscious and then shift it at the level of their subconscious to what they would like to believe.

lenders.name: Evans Family
lenders.loan_because: We believe that if you can help someone, you should help someone.  And we want this world to be a little better because we were here.
lenders.occupational_info:
El Salvador Sudan
Haiti Chad

lenders.name: Janne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people where they live.

lenders.name: Anne-Lise
lenders.loan_because: I think this is the best way I directly can provide for someone to get hold of their start-up capital for their business.
lenders.occupational_info: I help business owners and entrepreneurs develop a businessplan, a strategy or simulare economic related planning for themselves and their business.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: To help someone who are not so lucky as i have been in my life
lenders.occupational_info: Retiered masterbaker and production planing engineer

lenders.name: Torunn
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to help other people develop their business.

lenders.occupational_info: Currently blog about business and investing.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I believe we are a world community and I want to help people succeed when they are working to better their condition.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from paid employment.  I volunteer my time with my church, our local animal shelter, and various social justice organizations.

lenders.name: Anton
lenders.loan_because: I love to make people happy
lenders.occupational_info: I invent new things to make people happy

lenders.name: nicole
lenders.loan_because: BECAUSE I CAN

lenders.occupation: owner of a scin care clinic

lenders.name: Birgitte
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Mariann
lenders.loan_because: Maybe I can help someone make a better life for themselves.

lenders.name: Ric
lenders.loan_because: i can.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage risks for a small Jesuit university.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: While we all struggle in our own ways, I know that I am blessed with a lovely home and a great husband. I want to share what I have with other women and this is one way to do that on a global level. I chose to support mostly clothing businesses because my husband is in that business - a commonality.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide public relations, marketing and advertising services to small and medium sized businesses. These companies are looking to promote their businesses to other companies that need their services.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: I can:)

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune by helping independent people who want to improve their lives and their families lives by making their own way in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Water Colour Artist

lenders.name: Patti
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to be able to help others around the world, and make a positive difference in their lives.

lenders.name: Gudveig

lenders.occupational_info: I design old fashioned, sampler style cross stitch patterns
